Author: Ben Wilkinson
Summary: If you have a keyvault in your primary region and a secondary region, you may have a reason to sync up Keyvaults.Possibly you need to sync a keyault from a primary Vault to a secondary Vault for Dev or Testing.This script synchronizes secrets/keys based on the last modified time.
Title: Sync Azure Keyvault Secrets and Certificates between vaults
UserTags: Key Vault, Azure Key Vault, keyvault
